# widget_visibility enumeration

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/ui/widget_visibility
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T07:09:07.901069

---

Used by `widget.SetVisibility` determine how a `widget` is shown in the user interface.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /UnrealEngine.com/Temporary/UI }` |

## Enumerators

The `widget_visibility` enumeration includes the following enumerators:

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `Visible` | The `widget` is visible and occupies layout space. |
| `Collapsed` | The `widget` is invisible and does not occupy layout space. |
| `Hidden` | The `widget` is invisible and occupies layout space. |
